symbolic.py¶

Hylaa Symbolic dynamics construction

Construct A matrix and reset matrix / rhs from symbolic expressions

hylaa.symbolic.extract_linear_terms(e, variables, has_affine_variable)¶

Extracts linear terms from a flat sympy expression

Parameters

  • e – sympy expression

  • variables – list of variables involved

  • has_affine_variable – boolean indicting the existence of affine variables in expression

Returns

list of numbers, one for each variable

hylaa.symbolic.make_condition(variables, condition_list, constant_dict, has_affine_variable=False)¶

Makes a condition matrix and the right-hand-side (rhs) from a set of condition strings. condition_list is a list of strings with a single ‘<=’ or ‘>=’ condition like ‘x - 1 + y <= 2 * x + 3’

Parameters

  • variables – list of involved variables

  • condition_list – list of condition strings

  • constant_dict – dictonary of variable keys mapping to constant values

  • has_affine_variable – boolean indicting the existence of affine variables in expression

Returns

tuple: (mat, rhs)

hylaa.symbolic.make_dynamics_mat(variables, derivatives, constant_dict, has_affine_variable=False)¶

Makes the dynamics A matrix from the list of variables, derivatives, and a dict mapping constants to values.

Parameters

  • variables – list of involved variables

  • derivatives – list of symbols representing derivatives

  • constant_dict – dictonary of variable keys mapping to constant values

  • has_affine_variable – boolean indicting the existence of affine variables in expression

Returns

list of lists (a matrix) of size len(variables) by len(variables)

hylaa.symbolic.make_reset_mat(variables, resets, constant_dict, has_affine_variable=False)¶

Make the matrix for a reset operation

hylaa
